Start with a data lake. End with new business value. Discover Pivotal HD Now. <http://www.gopivotal.com/apj> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Pivotal HD™ <http://gopivotal.com/apj> is changing the way the world handles data. Harnessing the power of Hadoop and using fast SQL querying, it taps into vast amounts of data to provide organizations with insights that can be used to identify new opportunities and revenue streams.
View our infographic <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/Pivotal-HD-APJ-infographic-v1.0-edited-B-twothirds.jpg> to see how Pivotal HD helps enterprises get to new business value. <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/Pivotal-HD-APJ-Data-Lake.jpg> Pivotal HD <http://www.gopivotal.com/apj> SQL is an extremely powerful and widely adopted way to manipulate and understand data. Until now, Hadoop's SQL capability has been limited and impractical for many. Pivotal HD is the new benchmark for SQL on Hadoop - the most functionally-rich, mature and robust offering available.
Pivotal HD Benefits
- Enhance the Data Scientist and Analyst Hadoop SQL experience with HAWQ - Simplify the Hadoop Operator experience with enterprise Hadoop extensions - Improving the Hadoop Administrator experience with Pivotal Command Center
<http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4>
For more information, visit our Pivotal HD Asia Pacific website <http://gopivotal.com/apj>.
Join us at the first Asia Pacific Pivotal Summit 2013 <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/> October 23-24 Enterprises are using Big Data to run smarter, better and faster. Join us for two days of informative and interactive workshops. Gain strategic value and learn real world tactics designed to maximize data productivity in the enterprise.
Our line-up for this exclusive summit includes Pivotal CEO Paul Maritz, sharing his vision and mission for Pivotal – a company built for next-generation technology. He will be joined by his team of senior industry experts and key customers demonstrating how they derive business value from data. Space is limited for this highly anticipated, invitation only event, so register today <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php>.
